great game

A true gem. A game you can play plenty of times and still love it. Graphics and physics were truly revolutionary back in 2004, and to this day 12 years later they still all hold up very well. A tremendous story with great NPC's you grow attached to, 8+ hours of gameplay with a lot of replayability, funny moments, at times scary as all hell, and very challenging (not like Dark Souls challenging, but it's challenging). Expectations have risen ungodly amounts for the next Half-Life game, and I feel that we shall soon see what VALVe has been cooking up for us these last 9 or so years. They got a heavy weight on their shoulders, but I know they can pull it off.

If you have not yet played this amazing game or any of the other Half-Life games I highly suggest you buy them and play them. They're fantastic, they're linear, but the story is so compelling that you can't help but play it over and over again.

Oh boy, Half-Life 2. The sequel to one of the greatest single player first-person shooters ever made. Unlike with that game, I wouldn't say that this game hasn't aged well, but rather other games have done what this game did better since this game came out. Although this is an FPS, you aren't just killing things then entire time. Sometimes you have to drive a vehicle and sometimes you have to solve a puzzle. One of the most prominent features of this game is the Gravity Gun. You can use it as a means of simply moving something somewhere else, or use it as a weapon by launching it at your enemies. This game graphically set the standard for what a 7th generation game should look like, and I still think this game is worth playing for the unique experience it offers. Highly recommended for fans of first person shooters.

In my opinion, the Half Life series is phenomenal. I found the first game to be charming and wonderful. Half life 2 ups it up, now including combine, new cities- all things that werent in the first game, its no longer a game of survival, its to save the human race. Not much progression, basically go to point A to point B while doing various tasks in between to get there, but its what you do that makes the game fun, and how you do it. For example in ravenholm, you can go through normally, or you can entirely rely on the gravity gun (Also gets you an achievement) to manipulate the enviroment to your needs. It has the standard weapons, pistol, shotguns, automated weapons, grenades, etc,  but most of them are set apart in a way where no weapon feels the same- the pistol feels weak but does well in a pinch, the revolver is slow and overpowered (not taking ammo into account) the overwatch has a lower clip, reserve, and slower than the SMG, but its more powerful, as well as different alternates. The shotgun, well, is burst damage, like the revolver. The intelligence in design is great as well. Theres not much that is very well hidden, just a few lambda caches. This makes it so it gives rewards to those that explore. The combat is also great, not too much ammo, not too much health, and not too much enemies. You will be fine on normal mode as long as you stay keen on your ammo and health. I really enjoy this game and recommend all of those that heard about it to play it. Of course, this is just my opinion, but I still recommend to play it.

Half life 2. An MIT graduate named Gordon Freeman uses both brains and brawns to bring down the opposing forces of distant and multi-verse lands spanning over the course of 6 games and it all starts with Black Mesa, So go check out Black Mesa if you havent then get on with the Half life 2 series, followed by the Portal series.

This is a classic. I never played it the first time around, because for one thing, I am not much of a FPS guy and for another, I was broke all those years ago and had a low spec gaming rig that couldn't handle it even if i wanted to play it. Well, after checking out the free version of Black Mesa, I knew I had to play this one. This game plays like you are the star in a sci-fi horror action movie. Fantastic experience.

Il più bel gioco a cui abbia mai giocato.
One of the greatest games ever made. A true masterpiece you have to play to understand how great it is.

compared to most modern shooters this is actually pretty damn engaging. compared to the best shooters, HL2 is average.

on the positives you have excelent optimization, unique mechanics, good layouts, some of, if not the best visuals of its time, absolutely pissing on tons of other AAA game's visuals for years after release and some really fun sequences. but a number of flaws come to mind, for me personally i can't stand the vehicle sections, while featuring a fair amount of spectacle the pacing is horrible, lasting for an obscene amount of time each and in terms of structure they simply boil down to. move from A to B, play a brief shootout, get back in the car, repeat.

the shootouts give you the right amount of resources and offer a lot of clarity as to how you can approach them but the difficulty doesn't scale in a cohesive way, for some chapters the difficulty is just right but even on the highest difficulty, it just plummets and becomes laughable. the puzzles are fine, creative but are stupid easy the 2nd time around.

for what its worth its a good entry level single player FPS that you might love if you aren't familiar with the genre, it offers some replayability but you have to skip through some boring bullshit the 2nd time around, so you'll hardly ever beat it twice.

TL;DR buy the game you'll thank yourself

伟大的游戏，超越时代，10年后玩，依然让人着迷。 
在知乎曾经提问为什么HL2在游戏史上地位这么高？
祝佳音老爷的回答如下：

"要说《Half-Life2》的地位高，就得从《Half-Life》说起。当年阀门要出HL1的时候，业界几乎没什么人看好，整个游戏行业普遍认为HL1的野心太大——其实阀门也不过是想在FPS里加一点分镜和剧情而已，但当年的FPS游戏无非就是一个糙汉拿着枪打打打，类似《Quake》或者《Doom2》这种，迷宫接迷宫，怪物接怪物，开火就是了，废话都懒得说上半句。《Duke 3D》这种有脱衣舞女戳在关卡里当个世界观渲染品的游戏已经算是良心之作了——但阀门竟然要在FPS里加剧情！还有分镜！

没人看好他们，所以当《Half-Life》推出之后所有的人都被惊呆了，这群家伙大幅度修改了GoldSRC引擎，顺便找了一票科幻作家什么的给游戏赋予了引人入胜的剧情和过场动画。这让HL1疯狂大卖，顺便囊括了当年能拿的几乎所有游戏奖项。不过这游戏也值得得到这些荣誉，假如你曾经津津乐道于《Call of Duty:MW》的分镜设置或者是《HALO》的世界观，就顺手感谢一下HL吧。

所以说HL2属于标准的名门之后，万众期待，算是游戏界的iPhone4，每年都要被等得发疯的游戏爱好者拎出来膜拜一番（中途似乎出了个泄漏版，还折进去一票黑客，隐约记得那泄漏版里已经有那把”能吸一切“的反重力枪了）。人人皆赞暴雪跳票，但阀门才是跳票的王者——他们反正也不太差钱。

总之valve用了5年时间，在Source引擎（物理引擎基于Havok）的大能下搞出了HL2，HL2的品质的确是好，那把反重力枪所代表的技术能力和世界观就足以把99%的FPS踩在脚下了。剧情也棒，玩起来就停不下——所以地位高，除了出身高贵外，是因为他本身品质太出色了。”
If this is what opened Steam that is unspeakably embarassing.

UWAGA HEREZJE! 
Zacząłem grać od niedawna bo według strony metacritic jest to najlepsza gra ever i podobno w grze jest świat "Orwelowski" (jak z książki "Rok 1984" którą uwielbiam) Początek podobał mi się. Niestety zawiodłem się. Za dużo tych głupich zombie i kleszczy (head crabów) alienów i pająków, strasznie mnie to wkurzało, bardzo monotonne, uciążliwe i nieprzyjemne.
Jednak zauważam, że w czasach gdy ta gra wyszła to jej silnik mógł być czymś niezwykłym. Zauważyłem, że twórcy gry może i wzorowali się trochę na książce Orwela ale też na filmach Obcy, Matrix i Fight Club i filmach z zombie, oraz na grze Doom.
Za to zauważyłem że twórcy innych znanych gier które wyszły później: FEAR, Mirrors Edge, Stalker

Gdy dobrnąłem do końca ucieszyłem się że "nareszcie" i odinstalowałem, a mimo iż mam dodatek Epizod 1 i Epizod 2 to nie mam zamiaru w to grać.
